name: Mini Builder
description:
Mini Builder: the minimalist building game where you have to place buildings.  In this peaceful city builder, you have to try and build things under a one-minute timer.   You can buy a timer reset in order to restart the clock in this unique and fun building game.  This game is inspired by games such as Mini Metro by Dinosaur Polo Club and ISLANDERS by GrizzlyGames.  This game was made for Mini Jam #85, with the theme 'Gold' and the limitation 'One Minute Timer'.  This game was also created by a solo indie developer.

I hope you enjoy my game! - thisGameDev

Controls:

1 = Yellow Building

2 = Green Building

3 = Red Building

4 = Blue Building

WASD = Move Camera

(Note: These buildings will be placed wherever your mouse is.)

Mouse: Select/Build Zone
